Package com.abdcelik

Class BinarySearchTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

java.lang.Object
com.abdcelik.BinaryTree<E>
com.abdcelik.BinarySearchTree<E>
Type Parameters:
E - generic type of BinarySearchTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchTree<E>, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AgeSearchTree
public class BinarySearchTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends BinaryTree<E>
implements SearchTree<E>
BinarySearchTree class for a binary search tree that stores type E objects. E object should implement Comparable interface.
See Also:

    • add

      private BinaryTree.Node<E> add​(BinaryTree.Node<E> node, E item)
      Recursive add method. post: The data field addReturn is set true if the item is added to the tree, false if the item is already in the three.
      Parameters:
      node - the local root of the subtree
      item - the object to be inserted
      Returns:
      the new local root that now contains the inserted item

    • delete

      public E delete​(E target)
      Starter method delete. post: The object is not in the tree.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface SearchTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
      Parameters:
      target - the object to be deleted
      Returns:
      The object deleted from the tree or null if the object was not in the tree
      Throws:
      java.lang.ClassCastException - if target does not implement Comparable

    • delete

      private BinaryTree.Node<E> delete​(BinaryTree.Node<E> node, E item)
      Recursive delete method. post: The item is not in the tree; deleteReturn is equal to the deleted item as it was stored in the tree or null if the item was not found
      Parameters:
      node - The root of the current subtree
      item - the item to be deleted
      Returns:
      the modified local root that does not contain the item

    • findLargestChild

      protected E findLargestChild​(BinaryTree.Node<E> parent)
      Find the node that is the inorder predecessor and replace it with its left child(if any). post: The inorder predecessor is removed from the tree.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent of possible inorder predecessor(ip)
      Returns:
      the data in the ip
